body:
Well, regardless of whether this change is good for rails, I think it needs a little more documentation and a smoother upgrade path.

I just created a pull request that updates the documentation: https://github.com/rails/rails/pull/11756

I also created a gem that can help ease the transition:
 * https://github.com/zilkey/stricter-string-to-date
 * http://rubygems.org/gems/stricter-string-to-date

For anyone coming to this thread, you can get the old behavior back with something like this:

```ruby
String.class_eval do
  def to_date
    unless blank?
      date_values = ::Date._parse(self, false).values_at(:year, :mon, :mday)
      ::Date.new(*date_values)
    end
  end
end
```
